alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dodge, east central Pulaski and south central Bleckley Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hartford, or near Hawkinsville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Hawkinsville, Dubois, Hartford, Gresston and Baileys Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
